data.message: Great song about Circus Nelly the elephant was even fed up she packed her trunk and said good bye to the circus off she went with a trump trump trump lol , sorry I am musically minded when I saw Circus it's great to be part of life Circus on the inside looking out , i was thinking of the toy dolls who had  a Punk one hit wonder UK 80s I jump on others band wagons I must admit I sing 10 cc and Simple Minds and mamas and papas band wagon ,etc  EMN has a  unique Style That many wish I  take my hat of too from  UK
